name: Makeup & Dress Up Fun Games
description:
Play the hottest dressup and makeup game together. This is a visual treat for girls. Five dressup + makeup themes in one app. Create looks for: Fairy, Beach, Indian Bride, Cleopatra and Red Carpet. Go crazy with makeup, dresses and accessories and create stylish and beautiful looks.

Features:
- Five themes: Fairy, Beach, Indian Bride, Cleopatra and Red Carpet.
- Hundreds of unique combinations/looks are possible.
- Save the final look as a photo in your photos or make it your girly wallpaper :-)
- Create different looks for your girl friends and assign them as display pics for their contact details on your iPhone.

Have fun playing this game with your girly friends.
